Subject: Re: [junit] Testing a private method having arguments of type arrays
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=12653864; y=C2rGjYWIh77Erc2sT1wIEMA4zURMOhbBu-QUk2OBnMGaft2Z

Andrew McDonagh wrote:

> If its difficult to test the private method via the public interface, 
> then Listen To The Code..
> 
> 1) .make the private method public...
> 
> or
> 
> 2) Move the private method to its own class and make it public.


Sometimes, though not always, there's a third and best option:

3) Delete the private method.

Often untested private methods are untested precisely because nothing is 
using them, and if nothing's using them why are they in the code in the 
first place?


--
